website_summaries.verdict: The Optoma W306ST provides a good set of connectivity choices and 3D capability in a bright, short-throw WXGA data projector.
cons: Sub-par video, largely due to rainbow effect
Lacks port for USB thumb drive

customer_reviews.title: My clients love it. It saves so much on the projection ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used many projectors as rentals over the past 17 years. This one has incredeble short throw. My clients love it. It saves so much on the projection footprint. I have two, and bought them both December 2013. The first burned through its bulb at 315 hours. The second just burned it at 397 hours. They earn a ton in rentals, so I don't mind replacing the bulbs, but beware. They also start dimming at around 150 hours. I don't get where Optoma can claim 3500 hours, when I have two identicle units that both burned out under 400 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Denise or Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is fantastic. Everything you would want in a projector for presentations or a great movie experience. The picture is crystal clear. It doesen't have to be for from the screen to see it. GREAT BUY FOR THE PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lionel Williams

customer_reviews.title: Bright, compact unit but 'short throw' really means 'short throw'!
customer_reviews.text: Frankly when I ordered it, I didn't realise just how short the projection length was on this unit: you need to be within 4-5 feet of the projection surface, even for large images. Focussing is good, as is keystone adjustment, height adjustment less so. Image quality however is excellent and the in built speakers are quite adequate for a small conference room. Picks up color in backgrounds on video etc well, but be clear, it is a business projector, not a media unit. If these limitations are OK with you, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Brisbourne

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our church lounge. Installed it just 4 feet from the 120 inch screen. Looks fantastic and easy to use. The sound is adequate for bible study, FPU and other uses. Added a Vizio sound bar for movie night. Nice projector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clearer Picture
customer_reviews.text: The Optoma W306ST provided a clearer picture than the previous projector. Only issue is the power button got lodged underneath the lip causing some issues with turning on and off, and after running only a few hours - messages popped up stating that the filter needed cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT GEER

customer_reviews.title: short throw with beautiful picture
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this projector. I reviewed different options for 1 month. The lumens is great. Highly recommend this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Poole

customer_reviews.title: Good projector.
customer_reviews.text: This projector worked fine for our needs. The short throw is very convenient, and the picture seems to be pretty clear.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor T

customer_reviews.title: Great Short throw Experience :)
customer_reviews.text: I am relieved after buying this Projector. My other projector was a long throw . When myself or someone moved around , it was showing shadows. Disturbance for other people and suffocation for the person moving. The Short throw is amazing . The Projector is now kept close to the wall screen. No shadows now. Myself and others are free to move around without any concerns. Its Bright Clear, 3D is great !!!! It has a Vertical Keystone ...I wish it had a horizontal keystone as well. Perfect for my requirements -- watching movies , TV, Videos , 3D movies :)
customer_reviews.author: Ra. M. Sr.

customer_reviews.title: great projector!
customer_reviews.text: works great. the eco+ setting is very bright and clear. using it in a church that seats around 450 people and it looks better than our 6000 lumens long throw projector!
customer_reviews.author: Revfatman

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned Optoma HD66 which was stolen , but this projector is much better because it is a short throw projector. It is network controlled, which is great. Image is clear and sharp. Simply GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sergey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Installed it in our new conference room, couldn't be happier. The picture quality is just amazing using the HDMI port and projecting right onto an off-white wall.
customer_reviews.author: IT Department

product_meta.title: Optoma W306ST WXGA 3500 Lumen DLP Short Throw Network Projector (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
OPTOMA W306ST, WXGA, 3500 ANSI LUMENS, 3D-READY SHORT THROW PROJECTOR
View Larger UNSURPASSED SHORT THROW PERFORMANCE
The Optoma W306ST is designed to deliver unsurpassed short throw projection performance in classrooms and conference rooms. Whether your application calls for wall-mount installation or tabletop presentations, the W306ST will dazzle your audience with its 3500 ANSI lumens bright image, 15,000:1 contrast ratio and vibrant, color-rich, razor sharp images. The short throw design minimizes unwanted shadows on the presenter, allowing the audience to fully focus on the presentation. The Optoma W306ST is reliable and economical. Featuring the latest Optoma Eco+ advancements for ultra long lamp life, along with Optoma's commitment to quality, ensures your projector will provide years of care-free operation.

View Larger AT A GLANCE:
 * Perfect for applications requiring large, clear, easy-to-read text and graphics with exceptional color reproduction from a short projection distance
 * 3D Ready for the most amazing, most immersive viewing experience
 * Unsurpassed dependable performance
 * Advanced energy saving features to reduce the cost of operation
 * Easy to operate

LEADING THE DLP MARKET IN THE AMERICAS
Optoma Technology is the leading manufacturer of Texas Instrument's DLP projectors in North and South America. TI's DLP features multi-color processing to produce accurate and vibrant colors on the screen.

Optoma's product line offers products designed to meet the needs of any kind of user, from mobile professionals, gamers, and home theater owners, to much larger theater installations. Designed and built to deliver reliability, usability, and image quality, Optoma projectors help users get the most out of their digital content, encourage collaboration, and communicate clearly and effectively. Optoma projectors are designed to provide the features that you need today and in the future.

View Larger GREEN BY DESIGN
The W306ST has been designed and manufactured to:

 * Use less than one-watt power consumption in standby mode-Up to 75 percent savings compared to regular standby mode
 * Limit energy use, with automatic shut down and remote management and control
 * Employ long-life materials and components
 * Use components that are lead-free on all printed circuit boards
 * Use no polystyrene foam in the packing materials
 * Comply with RoHS standards to phase out the use of hazardous materials

WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
This package includes the Optoma W306ST, WXGA, 3500 ANSI Lumens, 3D-Ready Short Throw Projector, AC Power Cord, Remote Control, Batteries for Remote, Lens Cap, Multilingual CD-ROM User's Manual, and Quick Start Card.

WHICH SHORT THROW OPTOMA PROJECTOR IS RIGHT FOR YOU?
